system.requirements:
.Member of the Ministorum or 10+ Insanity.
Apt: Fellowship, Leadership
system.descriptionText: Character makes +0 Charm or Command Test, if successful all Comrades in Comms range immediately overcome any ongoing Fear or Pinning Tests, and an act normally on subsequent turns.

description.value: Character makes +0 Charm or Command Test, if successful all Comrades in Comms range immediately overcome any ongoing Fear or Pinning Tests, and an act normally on subsequent turns.
